entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 17 April 2023
